description.narrative: The objectives of the project are to: (i) develop a proper legal, regulatory, and supervisory framework to enable safe and sound growth of the microfinance and credit cooperative sectors; and (ii) develop the industry's capacity to meet sectoral regulations and institutional standards.

title.narrative: Outreach: number of (million) members and clients of MFIs and CCs to increase over the life of the project (cumulative).

comment.narrative: Baseline based on available data as of November 2012, which includes reports of actual CC membership from seven SROs and reportsofestimated CC membership from three SROs. Baseline may be updated later based on newly available data.
Project is not being implemented yet, so no new data is available. Hence, entering the baseline, but actual might be different.

Baseline based on estimates for MFIs from the MIX in 2012. As institutions start reporting under the new legal framework, thisbaseline (and ultimate target) may need to be re-visited. Portfolio at Risk is defined as (Gross outstanding balance of loans withpayments over 30 days late excluding payday loans + renegotiated and rescheduled loans, divided by gross portfolio outstanding).
Less than 10%
Project is not being implemented yet, so no new data is available. Hence, entering the baseline, but actual might be different.

title.narrative: Number of areas in which enabling legal and regulatory texts have been developed, adopted and implemented.

comment.narrative: The areas identified are: (i) tax, (ii) bankruptcy, (iii) loan loss provisions, (iv) reporting standards, (v) deposit insurance,(vi) banking legislation, (vii)consumer protection, (viii) MFI/CC supervision, (ix) microfinance, (x) credit cooperation, and (xi)prudential norms.

title.narrative: Software for the monitoring and supervision of the industry developed.
Modular management and reporting software for the industry developed.
Accounting Instructions for CCs and MFIs developed.
Feasibility study and strategy for Risk Insurance completed.
Feasibility study and strategy for the development of specialized rating agencies completed.
Feasibility study and strategy for the use/creation of credit bureaus completed.
Regulation and/or amendments to existing framework on Consumer Protection in MFIs and CCs developed.
Standard rules for conducting audits of CCs/MFIs developed.
Unified standards of CC/MFI performance approved by the MoF and/or FFMS.

target.value: Fully approved for CCs and MFIs
